name: Oculus Maximus (Canceled)
blurb: Here\u2019s your chance to BE a gladiator in the Oculus Rift. The first ever Gladiator combat game designed for virtual reality.

rewards.reward: No Reward
*** THANK YOU ***\r\nYou will receive a wallpaper, our thanks, and a fist bump emailed to you!
*** PLEBIAN ***\r\nSpecial Forum access to talk ideas with devs and exclusive backer concept art.
*** CITIZEN (Early Bird) ***\r\nYou receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** CITIZEN ***\r\nYou receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** BARBARIAN (Early Bird) ***\r\nYou gain Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** BARBARIAN ***\r\nYou gain Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** GLADIATOR (Early Bird) ***\r\nYou gain Alpha access, Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** GLADIATOR ***\r\nYou gain Alpha access, Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.
*** PROVOCATOR ***\r\nReceive a backer exclusive (in-game) sword, shield, armor, for your gladiator.\r\nYou gain Alpha access, Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.

*** MURMILLO *** \r\nExclusive Backer T-Shirt and you gain Alpha access, Beta access, receive the game plus all previous rewards.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)
*** THRAEX *** \r\nReceive a 3D printed miniature version of a gladiator plus and all previous rewards.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** SHIELD MAKER *** 
Work with our artists to design a shield for the game. Customized as you like, you can even etch your name on the inside for others to see. 
Plus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.
(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** WEAPON SMITH *** Work with our artists to design a one handed edged, blunt, or throwing weapon for the game. Customize the looks and characteristics of the weapon. Weapon must be one solid piece. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** ARMOR SMITH *** Work with our artists to design a helmet and armor for the game. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** RUDIARII *** We will sculpt your likeness as an enemy fighter. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** LANISTA *** We sculpt your likeness as one of the gladiator school owner's in the game. Your character will be seen during cut scenes in the story. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** GLADIATOR PRIMUS *** We sculpt your likeness as a top ranking Gladiator in the game (like a boss). You can also choose your weapon and armor from pre existing assets in the game. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** EDITOR *** We sculpt your likeness as an honored guest of the arena. Either as a Magistrate or Senator we will have your character be the announcer in arenas and may be used in various cut scenes during the story. \r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level.\r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)

*** HAIL CAESAR *** We sculpt your likeness as Emperor of Rome. In the Colosseum people will see you before the games.  If we hit the multiplayer stretch goal you can play as the Emperor.  Enter the arena with a 2 man praetorian guard to assist you in the fight.\r\nPlus previous rewards below the *** THRAEX *** pledge level. \r\n(Shipping&Handling outside of the US will add additional cost depending where you live.)
